name: Project Seagull
description:
BIOHAZARD ISLAND

PROJECT SEAGULL

You're in a strange island with little monsters walking around. Maybe you don't know what to do in this moment but there is someone waiting for you.

Controls-------------

- I --> view Controlls

- A-D --> Move

-Space --> Jump

-Space + A/D --> Impulse

- Left click -->  Attack

- Space + Left CLick -->  Attack on top

- Space + Space --> Fly

- Space + Space + A/D -->  Impulse

- Space + Space + Left click --> Attack while flying

- Space + Space + Q -->  Bomb

- O -->  Go to last checkpoint (in case you're in a bad situation or in case of bug)

Credits---------

Made By Tortu 

Idea Created by Tortu and Pajaro-Loco

Support from Pajaro-Loco

Made in Unity
